name: UIApplicationShortcutItem
desc: An application shortcut item, also called a Home screen dynamic quick action, that specifies a user-initiated action for your app.

items.name: init(type: String, localizedTitle: String)
items.desc: Creates an immutable Home screen dynamic quick action with a user-visible title and no icon.

items.name: init(type: String, localizedTitle: String, localizedSubtitle: String?, icon: UIApplicationShortcutIcon?, userInfo: [String : NSSecureCoding]?)
items.desc: Creates an immutable Home screen dynamic quick action with user-visible title, icon, and userInfo dictionary.

items.name: var localizedTitle: String
items.desc: The required, user-visible title for the Home screen dynamic quick action.

items.name: var localizedSubtitle: String?
items.desc: The optional, user-visible subtitle for the Home screen dynamic quick action.

items.name: var type: String
items.desc: A required, app-specific string that you employ to identify the type of quick action to perform.

items.name: var icon: UIApplicationShortcutIcon?
items.desc: The optional icon for the Home screen dynamic quick action.

items.name: var userInfo: [String : NSSecureCoding]?
items.desc: Optional, app-specific information that you can provide for use when your app performs the Home screen quick action.

items.name: var targetContentIdentifier: Any?
items.desc: The object that determines which scene handles the quick action.
